Package net.nologin.meep.tbv

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TileProvider
    Provider of Tile data for the TiledBitmapView (TBV from here on).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GenericTileProvider
    This class is a very basic/test provider implementation and is the default provider, should the developer forget to register their own with the TiledBitmapView.
    Tile
    The surface of a TiledBitmapView is rendered using a collection of these Tile objects, each holding a bitmap suitable for rendering a square area of the surface.
    TiledBitmapView
    The TileBitmapView is an attempt to offer a relatively simple SurfaceView whose bitmap contents come tilewise from a provider (similar to many mapping libraries, but this has nothing to do with mapping).
    TileRange
    Represents the range of tile IDs that make up the tile grid.
    Utils
    Some people think that such utility classes are a bad idea.
    ViewState
    An instance of this class is maintained by the TiledBitmapView.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GridAnchor
    When repositioning the grid to display a certain tile, this enum can be used to instruct the creation of the grid in such a way that the desired tile is located at the desired position on the view surface.
